name: vpage-cli
description: Create your simple webpage project with vpage template

scripts.git:init: git remote add gitee https://gitee.com/wavef/vpage-cli.git && git remote add github https://github.com/WaveF/vpage-cli.git && git push -u gitee master
scripts.git:push: git push --force gitee master && git push --force github master:main
